title: Control
description: Kate Summers career on the police force might be over. Her role as Mistress of Pain might be in jeopardy. But as a Private Investigator, Kate is on the case, catching killers and following the evidence no matter where it leads. She’ll do whatever it takes to solve a murder, even surrender her place as the Mistress of Pain and assume the role of a submissive. She’s crazy to consider the idea, and while she swore she’d never endure the submissive role again, Jake Davenport is the one Dominant fearless enough to take on the Mistress of Pain. She’s only pretending, but Jake isn’t. He knows she’s the submissive he’s been looking for and he’s determined to show her why he’s the Dom she needs. Meanwhile, her investigation takes them on a treacherous path. With a killer on the loose, bodies are piling up, and the investigation turns on its head when the trail of evidence leads to Jake.
author: Ellie Masters
